description: By design, CAR files store information about all models for one make (or company) from a single year. Car files are often distributed as collections, or an archive that contains multiple CAR files in a compressed format.
NOTE: The Car Explorer application is no longer available.

common_filenames.description: Assets.car - Name of the CAR file packaged in the Resources directory of an application installation.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .car file in Asset Catalog Tinkerer 2
images.caption: CAR file open in Asset Catalog Tinkerer 2
